name: Raised Letter Canvas Art (Large)
description:
Each & every work of art is custom-designed, hand-crafted and made to order with your personal words. Using the finest materials including chiseled wooden letters, 100% cotton deep profile stretch canvas and premium paints, your order comes alive upon receipt. So, we invite you to send us your unique specifications, and we will transform into contemporary art for your live, work and play spaces.

In everything we do, we infuse the K.I.S.S. principle. Some people interpret that as Keep It Simple, Stupid, others as Keep It Short & Sweet, but for us, it's all about Keeping It Stylish & Stunning! In that spirit, we bring clever words to life on canvas masquerading as pretty things.

Please visit FAQs for order instructions. Cheers!
